Name: The Past Rhapsody
About the game: Embark on this new adventure, uncovering a brave hero's quest as he encounters a variety of daunting locations in an attempt to return to the real world after entering the afterlife. Join Pavel and Hori on a strange voyage filled with darkness and truths that change their friendship forever. Bringing you a unique short story in the form of an RPG that captures the essence of the classic RPG era with 2D graphics, turn-based challenging combat, and a collection of mesmerizing original music, making your time with this mystical journey of Pavel and Hori worthwhile.
